support_body.message: Hi, I have some issues when using the extension, need your help:

pop_home_value1_desc.message: Automatically find target users from competitors and trending posts

pop_home_value2_desc.message: Filter high-quality accounts to improve follow-back rate

pop_home_value3_desc.message: Track results in real time and optimize your growth strategy

pop_home_footer_tip.message: Up to 140 follows per day Â· Safe rate control

feedback_description.message: We value your opinions, please let us know your thoughts and suggestions

feedback_success_tip.message: Thank you for your feedback. We will take your suggestions seriously

feedback_email_placeholder.message: If you need a reply, please leave your email

feedback_content_placeholder.message: Please describe the problem, suggestion, or idea you have encountered ..

feedback_tip1.message: Please provide a detailed description of the problem or suggestion you have encountered so that we can better understand

feedback_tip2.message: If encountering technical issues, please provide specific error information or screenshots

feedback_tip3.message: We usually reply to your feedback within 1-2 working days

feedback_toast_success.message: Thank you for your feedback! We will handle it as soon as possible.

feedback_toast_fail.message: Failed to submit feedback, please try again later!

tab_settings_description.message: Adjust settings to prevent account blocking (changes apply immediately)

tab_settings_advanced_warning.message: For advanced users only. Incorrect settings may increase ban risk.

tab_settings_preset_description_low.message: Safe and slow, minimal risk of being blocked.

tab_settings_preset_description_high.message: Fast and aggressive, higher risk of being blocked.
